item.description:
Here's the set schedule and specials!

Richters 6-7:30 (PBR, High life = 2$ Molson, Bass, Newcastle pints 4$)
Cafe Bottega 7:30-8:30 (3.50 Glasses, 2$ domestic beers, 5$ martini's, 4$ well drinks, 1/2 price appitizers)
Hula hanks 8:30-10:00 (open bar 9-10)
BAR 10:00-12:00 (open bar from 10-11)
Rudy's 12 am-2

Why a going away bar crawl? Because seriously, how else would Matt J leave New Haven after 3 years?

So come on out and celebrate my leaving with a whirlwind tour of New Havens bar and club scene.

List of bars to be added later after initial amount of interest is known.

Sign up now so I know how many people are interested, I need a min of 15 or else I'll cancel.

Update: There is no bowling ally, for some reason it keeps resetting it as a default but I'll be starting to make a list, seriously for those who told me they are coming, sign up so I know for sure!

matt
item.name: Matt J's going away Bar crawl
